dt-example.title: Select - whole row
dt-example.info: This example shows the [Select extension](//datatables.net/extensions/select) for DataTables being used with FixedColumns. With Select the end user has the ability to select elements in the table - in the case below this is done by clicking on the table cells (including in the fixed column) to select cells. Select is enabled using `se-init select`, which also provides its own configuration options.
